mapper.insert: insert into coupons(name, type, value, min_spend, total_count, received_count, start_time, end_time, status, create_time, update_time) values(#{name}, #{type}, #{value}, #{minSpend}, #{totalCount}, #{receivedCount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update coupons set name=#{name}, type=#{type}, value=#{value}, min_spend=#{minSpend}, total_count=#{totalCount}, received_count=#{receivedCount}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, status=#{status}, update_time=now() where coupon_id=#{couponId}
mapper.select: select * from coupons where status = 1 and (start_time is null or start_time <= now()) and (end_time is null or end_time >= now()) and (total_count is null or total_count = 0 or received_count < total_count)
mapper.update: update coupons set received_count = received_count + 1, update_time = now() where coupon_id = #{couponId} and (total_count is null or total_count = 0 or received_count < total_count)
